title: One Piece Episode #587 Anime Review
author: Chris Beveridge
description: An in-depth review of Episode 587 focusing on the battle between Law and Smoker, praising the serious approach to the fight and the intense final moments.
quote: It's all about Smoker that wins it over, especially the way the focus on the battle in the final minutes goes with some really intense moments.

title: One Piece Chapter 662 - Law VS Smoker
author: SHANNARO Blog
description: Detailed analysis of Chapter 662, which Episode 587 adapts, breaking down Law and Smoker's abilities and the tactical elements of their confrontation.
quote: The way Law handled Smoker was very impressively done.

title: LAW TAKES SMOKERS HEART?! - One Piece Episode 587 + 588 REACTION + REVIEW!
